topics.title: The Ethics of Persuasion
topics.prompt: If you can use logic to persuade people of anything, what responsibilities do you have? Is it ethical to persuade someone of something that benefits you but might not benefit them?
topics.guidance: Consider real-world examples like advertising, political campaigns, and social media
expected_outcomes: Develop critical stance toward persuasive messages

topics.title: Numbers in the Real World
topics.prompt: Find a statistic in the news today. How could you make it more understandable using the apple/train method or another analogy? What might be hidden or misleading about this statistic?
topics.guidance: Look for numbers about climate change, economics, or technology
expected_outcomes: Apply visualization techniques to real data
